page.shortlink: api client api date fromformat method

argument.name: format
argument.description: The format the date is in.

page.description: Extension to the native date variable to set the date variable to the value of the passed in date string.

discussion.p: By passing in a string and the date format the string is in, this method will set the value of the date.
See *[link:Date.toFormat]* for a full list of format values.
